name: Vertigo (itch) (MyIsaak)
description:
Follow the latest development updates on Twitter! Game Play

Vertigo is generally described as a 6DoF (Degrees of Freedom) first person shooter. Meaning players can move in any direction and rotate along any axis, without being affected by gravity. Only a few games of this type have ever been created, namely Forsaken and the Descent series.

Development

The code base including graphics is powered by Unity. Currently the game is under development and your game progress is tracked by secure Unity Services.

It has been fully ported to run on cross platform technologies and currently officially supports Linux, MacOSX and Windows.

We are also working to replace the original data pack with new textures, sounds and other assets.

Level Editor and Modeling Tools

We use Blender, an open-source 3d modeling application for our 3D assets

Most of our sound and audio files are procedurally generated.
